title: MXL Makes Bullish Cross Above Critical Moving Average - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Wednesday, shares of MaxLinear Inc (Symbol: MXL) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $22.28, changing hands as high as $22.56 per share. MaxLinear Inc shares are currently trading up about 3.1% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of MXL shares, versus its 200 day moving average:     Looking at the chart above, MXL's low point in its 52 week range is $14.87 per share, with $28.70 as the 52 week high point - that compares with a last trade of $22.45.
